headline.main: O'DWYER RECEIVES PLAQUE AND SCROLL; District Attorney Honored for Aid to 'Americanism'

lead_paragraph: District Attorney William O'Dwyer, Democratic candidate for Mayor, yesterday afternoon received a plaque and scroll for his work in behalf of "Americanism" and law and order at a luncheon in the American Legion headquarters, 160 Pierrepont Street, Brooklyn.
abstract: Luncheon; Dist Atty O'Dwyer honored, N Y C

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: VETERANS, DISABLED AMER, OF THE WORLD WAR
